headlines.title: Warner Bros. Discovery To Split Into Two Companies
headlines.description: Warner Bros. Discovery will split into two companies - Streaming & Studios will separate from Global Networks

headlines.title: Xbox finally reveals handheld console after decade of speculation
headlines.description: The ROG Xbox Ally will use Game Pass on-the-go - meaning subscribers start off with hundreds of games.

headlines.title: Stock market today: Live updates
headlines.description: The S&P 500 closed above 6,000 last week for the first time since February.

headlines.title: 2 dead in Las Vegas Strip shooting, with suspect known but not yet arrested, police say
headlines.description: "The shooting did not occur inside a casino," the Las Vegas Metro Police Department said

headlines.title: How Healthy Is Chicken Breast?
headlines.description: It’s a protein powerhouse. But it has other strengths, too.

headlines.title: Russia bombards Ukraine with 479 drones overnight, Ukrainian air force says
headlines.description: Russia launched a massive aerial attack, sending hundreds of drones to Ukraine.

headlines.title: Israel Intercepts Gaza-Bound Aid Ship With Greta Thunberg Aboard
headlines.description: Israel had vowed to prevent the vessel from reaching Gaza, saying its military would use “any means necessary” to stop it from breaching a naval blockade.

headlines.title: China says its exports to the US fell 35% in May, as trade talks are due to start in London
headlines.description: China has reported its exports to the United States fell 35% in May from a year earlier, straining the economy, as trade talks with Washington were due to start in London.

headlines.title: ‘I’m sorry’…. Julianna Pena issues statement following submission loss to Kayla Harrison at UFC 316
headlines.description: Julianna Pena has broke her silence in an apologetic yet defiant social media statement after losing to Kayla Harrison at UFC 316.

headlines.title: Why the U.S. tax bill's Section 899 could push European firms to list in the U.S.
headlines.description: Goldman Sachs identified a U.S. re-listing as one measure European companies could take to avoid the impact of Section 899 taxes.
